summary: This mod makes Skooma, more effective, and it also adds in a Recipe.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][u][i][b] Enhanced Skooma [/b][/i][/u][/size]

[size=4] Small Description [/size]
[size=2] This mod makes Skooma, more effective, and it also adds in a Recipe. [/size]

[size=4] The Effects And Why [/size]
[size=2] Damage Health by fifteen for one minute, because taking drugs does affect your health.
 Damage Magicka by fifteen for one minute, because when your \'off your head\' your normally acting like an idiot.
 Fortify Stamina by fifteen for one minute, as when your drunk or high, your going to have a rush and a lot of energy.
 Fortify One-Handed by fifteen percent for one minute, as when your drunk or high, your normally good at fighting.
 Paralysis for a moment, due to the fact that your \'off your head\', and I wanted to add something else to it. [/size]
author: Enoomnai
